genword.title: Samar da Kalmomi
genword.desc: Samar da kalmomi dangane da bayanan da ka shigar.
genword.placeholder: Ba a samar da kalmomi ba tukunna.
genword.constraints_ph: Shigar da ƙuntatawa (misali tsarin CV, sautukan da aka yarda da su)
genword.vibe_ph: Shigar da yanayin ma'anar da kake so (misali 'na dā', 'na zamani')
defaults.author: Marubuci
defaults.grammar: Dokoki\n\n// Shigar da dokokin nahawunka a nan...
wizard.overwrite_confirm: Shin kana da tabbacin kana son ƙirƙirar sabon shirye-shirye? Wannan zai share bayanan da ke akwai.
val.desc: Saita dokokin tabbatarwa da tsarin jeri don ƙamus ɗinka.
lbl.allow_duplicates_desc: Bada damar shigar da kalmomi fiye da ɗaya masu siffa ɗaya.
lbl.case_sensitive_desc: Ɗauki 'a' da 'A' a matsayin haruffa daban-daban yayin tabbatarwa.
lbl.allowed_chars: Haruffan da aka Yarda da su (Regex)
lbl.allowed_chars_desc: Kalmomin da suka dace da wannan regex kawai za su kasance ingantattu. Misali: a-zA-Z
val.no_bans: Ba a saita jerin haramtattun sautuka ba.
lbl.structure_desc: Saita tsarin gaɓoɓi ko kalmomin da aka yarda da su. Yi amfani da C don wasali (consonant), V don wasali (vowel). Misali: C?VC?V
sort.custom_order_desc: Shigar da haruffa a cikin tsarin haruffan da kake so (misali a,b,c,aa,ab,...) don jeri na musamman.
settings.title: Saituna
grammar.title: Editan Nahawu
grammar.bnf_placeholder: // Shigar da dokokin nahawunka a nan...
common.confirm: Shin kana da tabbacin kana son goge wannan abu?
grammar.no_morph_rules: Ba a saita dokokin tsarin kalma ba tukunna. Ƙara wasu don farawa!
dashboard.manage_lexicon_desc: Ƙara, gyara, da tsara kalmomi a cikin ƙamus ɗinka.
dashboard.define_grammar_desc: Ƙirƙiri dokokin tsarin jimla da ke jagorantar yarenka.
app.title: Korelang
app.subtitle: Babban kayan aiki ga masu ƙirƙirar yare
val.invalid_char: An sami haruffan da ba a yarda da su ba
val.must_start: Kalma ba ta fara da jerin da ake buƙata ba.
val.must_end: Kalma ba ta kare da jerin da ake buƙata ba.
lexicon.ai_requires_key: Samar da AI yana buƙatar lambar API.
lexicon.view_mode_pinned: Duba sabanin juna da aka saka
lexicon.no_matches: Babu abin da ya yi daidai.
integrity.title: Cire Haɗin Shigarwa
integrity.warning: Wannan kalma ita ce asalin wasu kalmomi a cikin ƙamus ɗinka. Cire haɗin zai lalata wannan dangantakar.
integrity.desc: Idan ka ci gaba, wannan kalma ba za a ƙara nuna ta a matsayin asali ba kuma rassan ta za su rasa haɗin su na 'an samo shi daga'. Wannan aikin ba za a iya soke shi ba.
lexicon.delete_confirm_desc: Shin kana da tabbacin kana son goge kalmar
lexicon.action_cannot_undo: Wannan aikin ba za a iya soke shi ba.
phonology.ai_disabled_desc: Da fatan za a saita lambar API ɗinka a cikin saituna don kunna ayyukan AI.
phonology.unclassified_consonants: Wasulan da ba a rarraba ba (ta hanyar AI)
phonology.unclassified_vowels: Wasulan da ba a rarraba ba (ta hanyar AI)
wizard.name: Sunan Shirye-shirye
wizard.author: Marubuci
wizard.optional: Na zaɓi ne, ana iya saita shi daga baya.
console.refactor_complete: An gama sake tsara bayanai kuma an haɗa su.
console.no_violations: Ƙamus ɗin ya dace da dokokin sauti na yanzu.
console.help_fix: Gyara kalmomin da ke karya dokokin shirye-shirye.
genevolve.commit_alert: An aiwatar da canje-canje a ƙamus!
genevolve.title: Samar & Haɓaka
genevolve.desc: Aiwatar da canjin sauti a ƙamus ɗinka kuma ka ga yadda kalmomin ginka suka haɓaka.
genevolve.placeholder: Gudanar da canjin sauti don ganin haɓakar a nan.
settings.api_key_ph: Shigar da lambar API na Gemini
settings.api_key_required: Lambar API ya zama dole don ayyukan AI.
settings.help_subtitle: Bi waɗannan matakan don samar da da kunna lambar API na Gemini ɗinka.
settings.help_step_1: 1. Jeka Google AI Studio don ƙirƙirar lambar API ɗinka. (Kuna buƙatar asusun Google)
settings.help_step_2: 2. Danna 'Get API Key in a new project' ko 'Create API Key in an existing project'.
settings.help_step_3: 3. Kwafi lambar API da aka samar.
settings.help_step_4: 4. Manna lambar API a filin shigarwa na sama.
settings.help_step_5: 5. Danna maɓallin 'Gama Saituna' don ajiye lambarka.
settings.help_free_desc: Ee, amfani da API na Gemini kyauta ne don amfani kaɗan. Duba takardun Google don bayani da matakan farashi.
whats_new.title: Menene Sabo a v1.0.2
whats_new.f1_desc: Tallafin rubutu daga sama zuwa ƙasa.
whats_new.f2_desc: Rubutun kwance daga dama zuwa hagu.
